00020 #ifndef RDK2_GEOMETRY_GEOMETRYFUNCTIONS
00021 #define RDK2_GEOMETRY_GEOMETRYFUNCTIONS

00023 #include <cmath>
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 #include "point.h"
00027 #include "segment.h"

00029 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {

00031 using namespace std;
00032     
00033 Point2d projectPointOntoLine(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm);
00034 Point2d projectPointOntoSegment(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm);
00035 double pointDistFromLine(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm);
00036 double pointDistFromSegment(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm);
00037 
00038 vector<Segment2d> recursiveLineFitting(const vector<Point2d>& points, double maxErrorAllowed);
00039 
00040 inline Point2d toLocalReferenceSystem(const Point2d& point, const Point2od& localReferenceSystem)
00041 {
00042     Point2d tempp(point.x - localReferenceSystem.x, point.y - localReferenceSystem.y);
00043     tempp = tempp.rot(-localReferenceSystem.theta);
00044     return tempp;
00045 }
00046 
00047 inline Point2od toLocalReferenceSystem(const Point2od& point, const Point2od& localReferenceSystem)
00048 {
00049     Point2d tempp(point.x - localReferenceSystem.x, point.y - localReferenceSystem.y);
00050     tempp = tempp.rot(-localReferenceSystem.theta);
00051     return Point2od(tempp.x, tempp.y, point.theta - localReferenceSystem.theta);
00052 }
00053 
00054 inline Point2d toGlobalReferenceSystem(const Point2d& point, const Point2od& localReferenceSystem)
00055 {
00056     Point2d tempp(point.x, point.y);
00057     tempp = tempp.rot(localReferenceSystem.theta);
00058     tempp.x = tempp.x + localReferenceSystem.x;
00059     tempp.y = tempp.y + localReferenceSystem.y;
00060     return tempp;
00061 }
00062 
00063 inline Point2od toGlobalReferenceSystem(const Point2od& point, const Point2od& localReferenceSystem)
00064 {
00065     Point2d tempp(point.x, point.y);
00066     tempp = tempp.rot(localReferenceSystem.theta);
00067     tempp.x = tempp.x + localReferenceSystem.x;
00068     tempp.y = tempp.y + localReferenceSystem.y;
00069     return Point2od(tempp.x, tempp.y, point.theta + localReferenceSystem.theta);
00070 }

00072 }} // ns
